SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.bgfx

Class BGFX.Functions

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.bgfx.BGFX.Functions
Enclosing class:
BGFX
public static final class BGFX.Functions extends Object
Contains the function pointers loaded from the bgfx SharedLibrary.
